entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
